entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Mauricie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:21 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Tuque 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Temperature: -4.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -7.0°C
Wind: SSE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending after midnight then clearing. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
